parameters.name: ChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

*   PrePaid: subscription.
*   PostPaid: pay-as-you-go.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the region to which the resource group belongs.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: The keyword used to query instances. Instances can be queried by instance ID or instance IP address.

parameters.name: InstanceIP
parameters.description: The IP address of the instance.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. For more information about how to query the instance ID, see [ListResourceInstances](~~412129~~).

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 100.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group. For more information about how to query the ID of a resource group, see [ListResources](~~412133~~).
